title: When the new champion rotation come out my free champions are still the same as last week...
body: Is it because the time I live over here( I live in japan :P) is different??  Or do i have to wait a little bit more??

replies.body:
Hey VIVAJAPAN!

I can understand how this can be incredibly confusing given the time zone and date differences (considering Japan is beyond the International Date Line).  Every Free Champion Rotation, we give a couple of days advanced notice.  Typically, Free Champion Rotations occur on Tuesday in the NA region.  I have gone ahead and checked, and the new Free to Play Champions have been released!  You should be able to see them when you re-launch your client!

I hope this alleviates some confusion!
